metadata.name: A Sunset Through His Eyes
metadata.description:
"In the morning I see the sun rise above the trees, the sea and the people that are just admiring once its on top of everything"

I wanted to do a homage and re-create the paintings of my grandfather ( Rafael Gutierrez Villase√±or) grabbing as much detail from the original pieces as possible to transport the viewer into the feeling that the painting represents. You Can check the real painting on my Instagram or Twitter

A % of the earnings will go to help my grandmother with all of her needs.
